exceptions.exn: In environment S : Set A : S -> Prop Add, Mult : S -> S -> S O, I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat Hr : is_ring Hcm : commutativity S Mult Hi : neutral S A Mult I Hint : integrity a, b, d1, d2 : S Hd1a : divide d1 a Hd1b : divide d1 b Hd1_d : forall q : S, divide q a -> divide q b -> divide q d1 Hd2a : divide d2 a Hd2b : divide d2 b Hd2_d : forall q : S, divide q a -> divide q b -> divide q d2 Unable to unify "A ?M1406 /\\ A d1 /\\ (d1 = O \\/ ?M1406 <> O /\\ (exists q : S, A q /\\ d1 = Mult ?M1406 q))" with "d1 = d2".

ctx: intros [Hr [Hcm Hi]] Hint a b d1 d2 Hgcd1 Hgcd2.
exceptions.exn: In environment S : Set A : S -> Prop Add, Mult : S -> S -> S O, I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat Hr : is_ring Hcm : commutativity S Mult Hi : neutral S A Mult I Hint : integrity a, b, d1 : S Hd1a : divide d1 a Hd1b : divide d1 b Hd1_d, Hd2_d : forall q : S, divide q a -> divide q b -> divide q d1 Hd2b : divide d1 b Hd2a : divide d1 a Unable to unify "Mult d1 I" with "d1".

original: intros [Hr [Hcm Hi]] Hint a b d1 d2 Hgcd1 Hgcd2. destruct Hgcd1 as [Hd1a [Hd1b Hd1_d]]. destruct Hgcd2 as [Hd2a [Hd2b Hd2_d]]. assert (d1 = d2). - apply Hd1_d. + apply Hd2a. + apply Hd2b. - subst d2. exists I. split. + apply inv_com. * apply Hcm. * exists I. apply (Hi a). + split; try apply Hi. reflexivity.
